Lyrics: 

        D7#9

Say the word and you'll be free say the word and be like me

        G7                            D7#9 

Say the word I'm thinking of have you heard the word is love



     Asus A

It's so   fine 

     Gsus G

It's sun  shine

         D7#9

It's the word love



D7                 C9            F6                   G7

In the beginning I misunderstood but now I got it the word is good



        D7#9

Spread the word and you'll be free spread the word and be like me

            G7                            D7#9 

Spread the word I'm thinking of have you heard the word is love



(chorus)



D7                 C9          F6                        G7

Everywhere I go I hear it said in the good and bad books that I have read



        D7#9

Say the word and you'll be free say the word and be like me

        G7                            D7#9 

Say the word I'm thinking of have you heard the word is love



(chorus)



D7                     C9                 F6                   G7

Now that I know what I feel must be right I'm here to show everybody the light



        D7#9

Give the word a chance to say that the word is just the way

         G7                            D7#9 

It's the word I'm thinking of and the only word is love



(chorus)



        D7#9       D7  C9  F6  G7  D7#9

Say the word love

        D7#9

Say the word love

        G7

Say the word love

        D7#9

Say the word love

         Asus A  Gsus G  D7#9

Say the word             love



D7   C9  F6  G7

(fade out)
